review: The potential is great, the operation is not. After five weeks of multiple calls to Fire support and my cable/wifi provider, I was told my Fire TV Stick had to be 5 (Five) feet from my wifi modem.Now the Fire TV Screen always said I had a " very good "connection and my cable company could "see" it was operating... But no streaming, no YouTube, Hulu, or BBC ( the latter two freebies).
